activities: RapidMiner supports other companies by using our products and knowledge to discover and leverage their unused business intelligence from existing data in order to enable better informed decisions and process optimization. For the purpose of service provision, customer care, sales activities, quality (including legal) management and marketing of our named services, we collect and use personal information. Customers in Europe may contact the organization directly or we receive such information from our European affiliated companies, if applicable.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Clients, customers, leads, employees, and suppliers from Europe
recoursemech:
We have agreed to TRUSTe dispute resolution for disputes relating to our compliance with the Safe Harbor Privacy Framework. If users have any complaints, they should first contact RapidMiner.  If contacting us does not resolve the complaint, they may raise their complaint with TRUSTe by Internet at http://watchdog.truste.com/pvr.php, fax to 415-520-3420, or mail to TRUSTe Safe Harbor Compliance Dept., at the mailing address found at http://www.truste.com/about_TRUSTe/contact_us.html. 
For human resources data we have agreed to cooperate with Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs).
